Name: Build buildings
About the game: Build buildings is a game that will test your focus and timing skills. In this game, you have to build a building, but it's not so easy. Try to build the maximum number of floors and test your reaction.You can change the type of buildings in the presence of experience stars. It can be played with the mouse.
